data.comment: The match is underway in West Bromwich.
West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Leeds have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
Leeds awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, At The Hawthorns, Leeds are penalized for being offside.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Bromwich's half?
West Bromwich have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
Goal kick for Leeds at The Hawthorns.
Own goal! Romaine Sawyers has scored at the wrong end to make it 0-1.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Leeds.
Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a West Bromwich throw-in in Leeds's half.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to West Bromwich.
Leeds's Kalvin Phillips is on target but unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for West Bromwich at The Hawthorns.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
Leeds are coming forward and Jack Harrison gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 29, It's a goal kick for the home team in West Bromwich.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
Lee Stephen Mason awards Leeds a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Goal! Ezgjan Alioski extends Leeds's lead to 0-2.
Throw-in for Leeds in the half of West Bromwich.
Goal! Jack Harrison extends Leeds's lead to 0-3.
In the minute 36, Patrick Bamford instrumental with a fine assist.
Lee Stephen Mason awards Leeds a goal kick.
Goal! Leeds extend their lead to 0-4 through Rodrigo Moreno.
In the minute 40, That's a fine assist from Mateusz Klich.
Ezgjan Alioski (Leeds) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for West Bromwich in the half of Leeds.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
Lee Stephen Mason will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Lee Stephen Mason blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Sam Allardyce is making the team's second substitution at The Hawthorns with Branislav Ivanovic replacing Matt Phillips.
The second-half has started.
Free kick Leeds.
In the minute 50, Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
Throw-in West Bromwich.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
In the minute 51, Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
Corner awarded to West Bromwich.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 54, Leeds to take a throw-in in West Bromwich territory.
Leeds's Patrick Bamford breaks free at The Hawthorns. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in West Bromwich.
In the minute 55, Leeds have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
Goal kick for West Bromwich at The Hawthorns.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Leeds.
In the minute 58, Jamie Shackleton is on a sub for Mateusz Klich for Leeds.
West Bromwich have a goal kick.
Lee Stephen Mason awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, The home team replace Karlan Ahearne-Grant with Matheus Pereira.
West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
West Bromwich push upfield but Lee Stephen Mason quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 66, Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Leeds.
Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
West Bromwich have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
Throw-in for Leeds at The Hawthorns.
In the minute 70, Leeds make their second substitution with Pablo Hernandez replacing Rodrigo Moreno.
Can West Bromwich capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leeds's half?
In the minute 72, Great finish from Raphinha to give Leeds a 0-5 lead.
Stuart Dallas with an assist there.
Filip Krovinovic is replacing Grady Diangana for the home team.
In the minute 74, Throw-in high up the field for West Bromwich in West Bromwich.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a throw-in for West Bromwich, close to Leeds's area.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Leeds.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
Goal kick for West Bromwich at The Hawthorns.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Leeds.
Helder Costa is replacing Raphinha for Leeds at The Hawthorns.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
In the minute 83, Leeds have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
Lee Stephen Mason awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
West Bromwich's Callum Robinson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in West Bromwich.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
West Bromwich needs to be cautious. Leeds have an attacking throw-in.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Can West Bromwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-5.
